https://tmrev.io/movie/767228-Ashes Fall 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null When a car bomb devastates a Nigerian neighborhood, victims flood a small, unequipped relief shelter. After one of the victims is identified as the bomber, Joanna, a volunteer doctor, must stand between a UN Peacekeeper who watched his friend die and the man possibly responsible for the explosion. Ashes Fall
